Mobile Navigation Test Page

This page demonstrates the mobile navigation implementation for Sabor Con Flow Dance website.

Mobile Navigation Features:

  • Hamburger Menu: Three animated lines that transform into an X when active
  • Slide-in Menu: Smooth slide-in animation from the right side
  • Overlay: Semi-transparent background overlay when menu is open
  • Touch Targets: All interactive elements have minimum 44px touch targets
  • Accessibility: Full ARIA support and keyboard navigation
  • Close Methods: Click X button, overlay, or menu links to close
  • Body Scroll Lock: Prevents body scrolling when menu is open
  • Responsive: Hamburger menu visible on mobile, hidden on desktop (768px+)

How to Test:

  • Resize your browser window below 768px width to see the hamburger menu
  • Click the hamburger icon to open the mobile menu
  • Notice the smooth animations and overlay effect
  • Try closing the menu using different methods
  • Test keyboard navigation with Tab and Escape keys
  • Check that body scroll is prevented when menu is open
